params.description: must be a string and one of the predefined values is required

id.description: must be a number and is required

tenant_id.description: must be a number and is optional

tenant_name.description: must be a string and is optional

tenant_type.description: must be a string and is optional

name.description: must be a string and is optional

class_id.description: must be a number and is optional

is_active.description: must be a boolean and is required

status.description: must be a string and one of the predefined values

created_by.description: must be a number and is required

updated_by.description: must be a number and is required
